title: The Vengeance of Lagardere
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Paul Feval.
description: Episode 6 of Series "Lagardere". Aurore and Flor are still held captive at the inn run by Marguerita and brother Laho. Lagardere breaks into the Escorial and steals the royal seals. He is caught by the royal guard. The penalty for such an act of theft is death. Although the king is quiet willing to be merciful, Lagardere insists on being executed in public. Only a miracle can now save him ...  Credits: Producer, Robert Velin ; director, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; writers, Marcel Jullian, Jean-Pierre Decourt ; photography, Georges Barsky ; music, Jacques Loussier. Cast: Jean Piat, Jacques Dufilho, Jean-Pierre Darras, Nadine Alari, Jacques Balutin, Claude Confortes, Marco Perrin
